SYN_1_5_3167: we took the patient to the OR for TBM symptoms severe cough and pneumonia put them under GA and put in a lma scope showed bad collapse everywhere plus a lot of pus which we sucked out so we put in a dynamic y stent used the rigid to seat it looked okay sent to pacu but then the xray showed it migrated and was too short on the right so back to the OR we went put the rigid back in took out the first stent customized a dumon y stent and put that in instead fits much better airways open now no bleeding wake up was fine send to floor.
